changelog: Important: Due to high demand, PegaProx releases will now be weekly due to shortage of our capacity to handle support requests. Please wait patiently.
Added: SSH Rate Limiting for large clusters (15+ nodes) - prevents connection exhaustion during batch operations
Added: Two-tier SSH system - HA operations (fencing, heartbeat) always have priority over normal operations
Added: SSH retry logic with exponential backoff (3 attempts: immediate, 2s, 4s delay)
Added: Pool Permissions - grant users/groups access to Proxmox Resource Pools (requires manual refresh due to Proxmox API)
Added: Pool Manager - create, edit, delete pools and assign VMs directly from PegaProx
Added: Proxmox Native HA Settings in Datacenter Options
Added: Expanded Datacenter Options (bandwidth limits, tag settings, resource scheduling)
Added: More functions in Setup Wizard
Added: Dynamic password policy hints in all password forms (fetched from server settings)
Fixed: Password Policy Bug in Settings Modal (ReferenceError: settings is not defined)
Fixed: Bulk Migration Modal now fully translated (German/English)
Improved: SSH_MAX_CONCURRENT default increased to 25 (configurable via environment variable)
Improved: 1 second delay between nodes during batch deploy operations
